Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupproject.Entity
      • groupproject.Moby
        • groupproject.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

    public class Player
extends Moby
    Extension of Moby Describes the player character
